testcase.classname: Gmail compose and send mail feature
testcase.name: Test compose button
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed When User opens the gmail login page........................................passed Then User login to gmail with username "sampletestproject80@gmail.com"......passed And password "testproject@80"...............................................passed And User clicks on the compose button.......................................passed Then Check the New Message box appears......................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed

testcase.classname: Gmail compose and send mail feature
testcase.name: Test send mail
testcase.system-out: Given User launches the browser.............................................passed When User opens the gmail login page........................................passed Then User login to gmail with username "sampletestproject80@gmail.com"......passed And password "testproject@80"...............................................passed And User clicks on the compose button.......................................passed Then User composes mail with To "sampletestproject80@gmail.com" Subject "Incubyte" Body "Automation QA test for Incubyte".passed And clicks Send.............................................................passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
